data.name: VR crazy racing
data.detailed_description:
This is a casual game of racing and racing. Players put on their helmets and sit in the cockpit. Let’s have speed and excitement with the computer racer. Players need to concentrate on avoiding mistakes. If you exceed one car after another, you must pay attention to avoid collisions with them, ensure the speed and avoid mistakes and rush to the first place.

Instructions:
The trigger button on the right handle interacts with the ui menu and the throttle, the touchpad is under the throttle is the brake, and the menu button calls out the menu;
The left handle touchpad controls the left and right steering, and the menu button calls out the menu;
data.about_the_game:
This is a casual game of racing and racing. Players put on their helmets and sit in the cockpit. Let’s have speed and excitement with the computer racer. Players need to concentrate on avoiding mistakes. If you exceed one car after another, you must pay attention to avoid collisions with them, ensure the speed and avoid mistakes and rush to the first place.

Instructions:
The trigger button on the right handle interacts with the ui menu and the throttle, the touchpad is under the throttle is the brake, and the menu button calls out the menu;

data.short_description: This is a casual game of racing racing. Players put on helmets and sit in the cockpit to compete with computer racing. Be careful not to collide with them, to ensure the speed, and to avoid mistakes and rush to the first place.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
